statements: SELECT * FROM Coaches;
SELECT coach_name, training_plan FROM Coaches ORDER BY coach_name DESC;
SELECT coach_id, coach_name, workout_log FROM Coaches WHERE coach_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Coaches WHERE training_plan LIKE '%strength%';
SELECT coach_name, workout_log FROM Coaches ORDER BY coach_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Coaches WHERE coach_id = 1;
SELECT coach_name, training_plan FROM Coaches WHERE coach_id > 1 ORDER BY coach_name DESC;
SELECT coach_id, LENGTH(workout_log) AS log_length FROM Coaches WHERE coach_name LIKE 'J%' LIMIT 3;
SELECT coach_id AS ID, CONCAT(coach_name, ' - ', training_plan) AS coach_info FROM Coaches WHERE LENGTH(workout_log) > 100;
SELECT coach_name, SUBSTR(training_plan, 1, 20) AS short_plan FROM Coaches WHERE workout_log IS NOT NULL ORDER BY coach_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Coaches;
SELECT coach_name, coaching_specialty FROM Coaches;
SELECT coach_name FROM Coaches WHERE coaching_specialty = 'Soccer';
SELECT * FROM TrainingPlans;
SELECT plan_name, start_date, end_date FROM TrainingPlans;
SELECT * FROM Coaches
SELECT coach_name, coaching_specialty FROM Coaches ORDER BY coach_name DESC
SELECT coach_name FROM Coaches WHERE coaching_specialty='Fitness'
SELECT plan_id, plan_name, start_date, end_date FROM TrainingPlans WHERE coach_id = 1 ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT coach_name, plan_name FROM Coaches INNER JOIN TrainingPlans ON Coaches.coach_id = TrainingPlans.coach_id
SELECT * FROM coach
SELECT plan_id, plan_name, start_date, end_date FROM training_plan
SELECT coach_name, creation_date FROM coach
SELECT plan_id, coach_id, plan_name FROM training_plan ORDER BY coach_id DESC
SELECT log_id, plan_id, log_date FROM workout_log ORDER BY log_date ASC
SELECT * FROM coach WHERE coach_id = 1;
SELECT coach_name, creation_date FROM coach WHERE creation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT plan_name, start_date, end_date FROM training_plan WHERE coach_id = 2 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT log_date, workout_description FROM workout_log WHERE log_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT coach.coach_name, training_plan.plan_name, workout_log.log_date FROM coach JOIN training_plan ON coach.coach_id = training_plan.coach_id JOIN workout_log ON training_plan.plan_id = workout_log.plan_id WHERE coach.coach_id = 3 ORDER BY workout_log.log_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Coaches;
SELECT coach_name, coaching_specialty FROM Coaches WHERE coach_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT client_name, Clients.client_id, coach_name FROM Clients JOIN Coaches ON Clients.coach_id = Coaches.coach_id;
SELECT plan_name, plan_description FROM TrainingPlans WHERE coach_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY plan_name DESC;
SELECT client_id, client_name, coaching_specialty FROM Clients JOIN Coaches ON Clients.coach_id = Coaches.coach_id ORDER BY client_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Coaches;
SELECT coach_name, coaching_specialty FROM Coaches WHERE coaching_specialty = 'Strength Training';
SELECT client_name, coach_name FROM Clients JOIN Coaches ON Clients.coach_id = Coaches.coach_id;
SELECT log_date, log_details FROM WorkoutLogs WHERE log_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT plan_name, coach_name, client_name FROM TrainingPlans JOIN Coaches ON TrainingPlans.coach_id = Coaches.coach_id JOIN Clients ON Coaches.coach_id = Clients.coach_id;
SELECT * FROM Coaches;
SELECT coach_id, coach_name FROM Coaches ORDER BY coach_name DESC;
SELECT plan_name, coach_name FROM TrainingPlans JOIN Coaches ON TrainingPlans.coach_id = Coaches.coach_id;
SELECT log_datetime, plan_name FROM WorkoutLogs JOIN TrainingPlans ON WorkoutLogs.plan_id = TrainingPlans.plan_id ORDER BY log_datetime ASC;
SELECT exercise_name, sets, reps FROM Exercises JOIN WorkoutDetails ON Exercises.exercise_id = WorkoutDetails.exercise_id WHERE Exercises.coach_id = 1;
SELECT coach_name, plan_name FROM Coaches c JOIN TrainingPlans tp ON c.coach_id = tp.coach_id
SELECT * FROM WorkoutLogs wl WHERE log_datetime BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT exercise_name, sets, reps FROM Exercises e JOIN WorkoutDetails wd ON e.coach_id = wd.coach_id
SELECT coach_name, log_datetime, plan_name FROM Coaches c JOIN WorkoutLogs wl ON c.coach_id = wl.coach_id JOIN TrainingPlans tp ON wl.plan_id = tp.plan_id
SELECT DISTINCT coach_name FROM Coaches WHERE coach_id IN (SELECT coach_id FROM TrainingPlans WHERE plan_name = 'Fat Loss')
